# datapower_configdeploymentpolicy (Data Source)

Deployment Policy

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datapower_configdeploymentpolicy" "test" {
  depends_on = [datapower_configdeploymentpolicy.test]
  app_domain = "acc_test_domain"
}
```
